name: Kringles Delivery
description:
Music by: https://www.instagram.com/jonathanyoudale/?hl=en

Supports both xbox & keyboard controls

Controls:

  • Gamepad: A to drop
  • Keyboard: J to drop

Drop the presents into the chimneys to increase your combo & score. If you miss or hit bad/avoid house's you'll reset your combo. Lose all 3 lives and it's game over.

This is just a small game i've made in my custom win32 C++ game engine. The engine is very new so there maybe some issues with it still such as audio being glitchy. These will hopefully get fixed later.

Thanks for playing!
